lender.name: Agustin
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving a person in need a hand up & not a handout.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I care about you!
lender.occupational_info: I create communication cable designs that carry the Internet from computers to regional hubs.

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: I want to support the development of local, sustainable, environmentally responsible businesses in the developing world.

lender.name: Kent & Gigi
lender.loan_because: Life has been good to us and we want to share our good fortune with others.
lender.occupational_info: I help small businesses identify new markets and grow their business.

lender.name: Jhilson
lender.loan_because: I believe in creating change thru actions
lender.occupational_info:
- Help farmers learn new skills in Economy and Marketing
- Ayudo a los granjeros a aprender cosas nuevas en Economia y Mercadeo

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it so easy to make a difference in someone else's life. I'm really glad I'm able to help with the money I'm able to give.

lender.name: Scott and Gail
lender.loan_because: We want to see other people make a better life for their family.
lender.occupational_info: Electrician

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I can, and it's the right thing to do... besides it's a huge blessing and I get a real kick out of it!
lender.occupational_info: Helping the poor in spirit, helping the poor in fact!

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: In Kiva, I have finally found an affordable way to help others in need. I am eternally grateful to the person who founded this organization and offered me a way to give back with a feeling that I am actually helping.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired legal secretary who now spends most of my time with my grandchildren while my children work. I feel blessed to be able to do this.

lender.name: Florante
lender.loan_because: "You must be the change you wish to see in the world." (Mahatma Mohandas Gandhi).

lender.name: M Kay Keller
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed. I want to share my blessings with others!
lender.occupational_info: I want to make chilren's lives better! All children!

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life.......I didn't know it would feel so good!

lender.name: Dylan
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to have everything I need, therefore it is important to help those less fortunate.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: EVERYONE DESERVES A CHANCE!

lender.name: Iris
lender.loan_because: Women need empowerment. Even me. Lord knows I'd rather be doing this for someone American - especially an African-American woman; but if there are women who can set up shop with all the red tape and taxation that prevent me from easily doing same, women who can provide for selves and family for an amount that is chump change for an American worker, then if I've got it to lend, I'm glad to help. Then one day, maybe that person will help their countryman succeed, and maybe one day I'll be able to do the same. As of 1/12/10, though, my thoughts are with helping Haiti rebuild.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a newspaper. Businesses who want to sell a product or service send information to me, and I turn that information into advertisement that they can publish in the newspaper. I try to make the advertisement catch the eye of a potential buyer!

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: I believe that this method can really make a difference to the people the loans are advanced to and also I have control over where & to whom the money is advanced
lender.occupational_info: Making a safe comforting environment for my family and friends where they can always feel accepted and loved for who they are - not what they do or how much they have.

lender.name: Amy and Randy
lender.loan_because: The Lord has blessed us with all that we need and I want to help others

lender.name: Clint
lender.loan_because: From the heart of man leaps forth one brush stroke of hope and the world is changed forever.
lender.occupational_info:
Across the misty valley he sees not the trees, but the forest. And in the land he lives he sees what was, and what will be. And it is upon his shoulders that the weight of the universal land restoration charge shall rest.
Please Help Restore The Land
Plant Trees
Be Kind To Nature
Be Kind To Each Other
Thank You......You Rock !!!

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: We all need to help each other, around the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I diagnose and repair large UNIX computer systems.

lender.name: Elzbieta
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and have been helped out by so many people. I believe that people can accomplish so much when they have others who believe in them. This is my way of saying I believe in you.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and my family, and I hope to be a blessing to someone else.

lender.name: Trish
lender.loan_because: It's a great opportunity to help other women.
lender.occupational_info: I help busy people with the demands of their daily life.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: People should help each other if they can.
lender.occupational_info: I currently am a full-time college student and plan on working in the Conservation and Natural Resource arena.

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: I am single with two grown married children and I know how hard it is to raise children alone and make ends meet. If I can continue to be blessed with a roof over my head then I will try and help someone else secure a roof over they're heads as well...God bless.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital that deals with very sick people with addictions and mental health issues.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage entrepreneurs in less-developed areas and help women where the odds might not be in their favor.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of the operations at an art museum in Los Angeles. I am also an entrepreneur working on building a small hotel in Central America. I'll need a loan myself one of these days!

lender.name: Tom Malthus
lender.occupation: Minister - First Church of Economic Agnosticism
lender.loan_because: Hey, I could easily spend $25 on golf balls in one month. Can't believe this same amount can fund such good ventures that add to the world GNP.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a minister in the First Church of Economic Agnosticism. We don't know if there is a God or not, but if there were a Supreme Being, He/She is most likely using the laws of supply and demand to govern the universe. We are currently seeking a prophet.

lender.name: gerard
lender.loan_because: microcredit is the most effective way to empower women and thus reduce poverty in the developing world.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I believe it is our responsibility to help others who are less fortunate, if we ALL contribute the quality of life for so many people and families could greatly improve!
lender.occupational_info: I work in skin care, massage, health well being and beauty.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I'm highly in support of entrepreneurship and providing the means for one to achieve their dreams and improve their lives. I'm inspired by their spirit and their efforts to make things happen.
lender.occupational_info: Empower others. Change the world.

lender.name: Marco Antonio
lender.loan_because:
I feel good when I help those who need it the most. And coming from Guatemala, thinking that it could be me needing a helping hand....well...I'd be elated knowing someone half way around the world would be willing to invest in me. You'd might call it, "Paying it forward" :-)
Que Dios los bendiga!
lender.occupational_info: I am on a journey . . . a journey of discovery. And although I do not know where that journey is taking me, I have not forgotten where I started.

lender.name: Nico
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Hiu Lam
lender.loan_because: Arrr, I be need'n to hide me booty somewhere!

lender.name: Tracey
lender.loan_because: Helping people to help themselves...install dignity, self-worth and self-sufficency into anyone and there is a whole lot of room for success!

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Work with small to mid sized companies to start or enhance the retirement benefits they offer their employees.

lender.name: Kimberlee
lender.loan_because: I can have a positive impact on someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a shelter for victims of domestic violence. Women and their children can leave abusive men and come stay in our shelter and be safe.

lender.name: Herb J
lender.loan_because: Loans provide assistance without robbing people of their dignity. Giving charity may make us feel good, but does not allow the recipient to be our equal.
lender.occupational_info: I work with The Salvation Army in the United States.

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: I have everything I could ever want in life and feel very fortunate. My children and I do this together and it brings us together :). Pass It On!!!

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in parts of the world that I've visited. I've recently been in Armenia and Peru so am concentrating my lending in those parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I managed people that worked with computers

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner myself and I know how hard it is to get a business up and going and keep it running once established.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Registered Nurse and a Licensed Hairdresser

lender.name: Juliette
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in orther peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help families find homes to live in.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I want people to know that someone out there cares and wants to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help people everyday improve their financial situations and settle their problems in Milwaukee, WI, U.S.A.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to create prosperity through global trade, and that takes capital. I particularly want to provide business women in Islamic countries with the capital they need to be financially secure.
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in international trade

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I enjoy my career and my lifestyle very much and I would like to help hard working people around the world realize their own dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I write and produce television programs for U.S. networks.

lender.name: Julie Anne
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: pondering

lender.name: Tony
lender.occupational_info: I recycle paper and Cardboard

lender.name: Alain
lender.loan_because: God is with me when I am with them.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: it's important for people to have something to work towards instead of a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I teach my child at home instead of in a formal school. We learn the basics out of workbooks but otherwise, do life learning.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: Kylie and I seek to assist those less fortunate then ourselves through investing in micro businesses to help improve sustainability, society and economic growth in less developed countries.

lender.name: Marcus
lender.loan_because: Donating through Kiva allows me to see exactly how my money has helped someone improve their life.
lender.occupational_info: I work for The Royal British Legion, providing health and safety advice across the South West region of England.

lender.name: Rene
lender.loan_because:
It is my solemn belief that the answer to mans eternal question, why am I here? Has always been, to serve your fellow man.
Here is a fabulous way to do so, through Kiva.org. Lets empower people by sharing the wealth!

lender.name: Tedd
lender.occupational_info: I work in the computer software industry, development of computer software. I go to meet with customers and help in the process of product development.

lender.name: Janne
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people to help themselves

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed and would like to help others achieve their goals and dreams. Through this organization I find that sometimes it is simply helping someone maintain a simple sense of pride in taking care of their family.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer to take people out of reality for a few hours and into a world where anything can happen.

lender.name: Mag
lender.loan_because: I have and they need...

lender.name: Ron Koch
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help people create businsess and sustain themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help build software that banks use to analyze their customer and lending information.

lender.name: The optimist
lender.loan_because: With the hope that by lending a hand it helps others to extend a hand to someone else and brings humans closer to one another.

lender.name: Mimi
lender.loan_because: of the butterfly effect of Kiva. A tiny donation can make a big difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I sell residential real estate in Raleigh, NC - USA.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: in an ideal world we would readily give to each other but a loan is also a relationship, a give and take, a recogniton of each other.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I am my brother's keeper

lender.name: Sarah
lender.occupational_info: I entertain on television and movies.

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: i'm trying to make a difference...
lender.occupational_info: guiding/traveling/tour-operator/events

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: Just one drop of water could be the start of a waterfall....
lender.occupational_info: I train and offer study support services to health care professionals conducting clinical research.

lender.name: mirav
lender.loan_because: I know Microfinancing works!!! Did a story about the "women's World Bank" and learned a lot about microfinance and how it works. I also went on study tour with the Heifer Project, (they loan cattle) and saw the success with my own eyes. I think KIVA is a brilliant idea!!!
lender.occupational_info: I help make TV stories by putting sounds together with pictures to tell a story.

lender.name: Dorie
lender.loan_because: I travel all over the world and am always looking for true and valuable ways to help the local people I meet. This is a fantastic opportunity!
lender.occupational_info: I teach in a primary school, currently teaching 4/5 year old boys and girls.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: I want to help support female entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Texas Girl
lender.loan_because: I want to share and to extend peace to another human being.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large company that provides business services to others.

lender.name: joanie
lender.loan_because: Love seeing people able to work for themselves.

lender.name: ITM
lender.loan_because: Our team wants to forge corporate citizenship and stimulate the entrepreneural spirit to drive individuals out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Our team of international treasury consultants helps clients across the US mitigate risk by establishing efficient treasury structures.

lender.name: Stewart
lender.loan_because: I am inspired and fascinated by entrepreneurs where ever they are in the world. Kiva allows me to support those in countries that don't offer entrepreneurs the same opportunities that we have here.
lender.occupational_info: I manage projects that improve the way the organisation's I work for operate.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I want to share and to be a light to those who are in need. I want to make more than a difference!

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand sometimes!

lender.name: Seamane
lender.loan_because: These are people trying to do better for themselves and those around them. If I can help even a little bit, why wouldn't I? We all should. I admire all of these people and wish them great success.
lender.occupational_info: I take things that people have written (books, essays, letters, etc.) and make them read more clearly and correctly.

lender.name: Karen & Keilee
lender.loan_because:
we care.... and even though it isn't as much as we would like, it is enough to make a difference.
<3 K&K
lender.occupational_info:
I am a single mom who homeschools my 8 year old daughter.
I work from home for a trailer rental company for Cast and Crew in the entertainment industry.

lender.name: Don Hyndman
lender.loan_because: My garden is in full bloom.My puppy Libby and i would like to share it while your garden is still growing.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: it makes a real difference in people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I focus on art that has been put up on the street for free.

lender.name: Dennis & Hilda
lender.loan_because: I like to promote others in achieving their goals.

lender.name: Jennifer and Todd
lender.loan_because: we can and we should.

lender.name: Heber
lender.loan_because:
There are a number of reasons why I lend :
The first and most important is simply because I feel that anyone who has been blessed as much as I owes an obligation to God and to society.
By providing financing whether for seed capital, expansion projects, or operating expenses we can help an ambitious entrepreneur make ends meet, while enhancing rather than diminishing his/her dignity. Having lived over 85% of my live in less developed countries I have noticed that the least privileged are much more ambitious and innovative than many assume.
By providing some small assistance to help the less privileged achieve their goals through the context of individual strengths, insights, and dreams we can forestall the need for them to fall back on the already bloated and inefficient central government social mechanisms.
Rather than give a man a fish or teach him how to fish, Kiva.org lets us finance his/her ambition and first hand knowledge of the local community.
I also lend because it is kind of fun to manage a loan portfolio. Besides helping others in need I like to try my hand at loan selection and try to maintain a healthy portfolio.
lender.occupational_info: Married with 3 children. Wish I could do more to help people rise to a higher level.

lender.name: Ed, M.E. and John
lender.occupation: We are 3 people: Priest, Minister, cabinetmaker
lender.loan_because: Instead of paying Ed for spiritual direction, we use those monies to help those less fortunate. We believe that Christ has called us to share our resources with the poor, and kiva is a great way to empower people to help themselves. We are proponents of microlending and other avenues of socially responsible investing, and are glad to be a part of kiva.org.
lender.occupational_info: -Ed is a priest & teacher, and spiritual director for M.E. -M.E. does ministry on a college campus. -John (M.E.'s husband) is a cabinetmaker and engineer.

lender.name: siobhan
lender.loan_because: I admire these people and their spirit of entrepreneurship.

lender.name: MIKE & DENISE
lender.loan_because: WHEN WE'VE NEEDED HELP ~ OTHERS HAVE ALWAYS BEEN THERE TO ASSIST AND I WOULD LIKE TO PASS ON THE BLESSING ~
lender.occupational_info: MIKE / ELECTRICIAN - CONSTRUCTION AND REPAIRS TO ELECTRICAL SYSTEM'S. DENISE / COUNTY CLERK - STATE AND COUNTY GOVERNMENT MANAGEMENT

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: It is each of our responsibility to take care of our fellow human beings. I am fortunate to have enough resources where I can afford to share with others needing a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to be effective advocates for their needs, and how to participate in the political process. I work to strengthen democracy in my country.

lender.name: Mrs. Moore
lender.loan_because: We loan in order to learn about microeconomics and how one small investment can make a big difference for an entrpreneur. We like knowing that even as 13 and 14 year olds we can help change people's lives for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 8th grade social studies in Alpharetta, GA, USA. We are learning about our home state of Georgia and how we can become involved in the global market place.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I was introduced to Kiva by a wonderful person. I looked into Kiva and found it to be a worthy cause.
lender.occupational_info: I use to work with computers. It was very challenging.

lender.name: Susanne & Chris
lender.loan_because: We know that a little jump start can make a big difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: To receive God's blessings, you must be willing to give.

lender.name: Christine&Jessica
lender.loan_because: we can, and we care.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I've been given opportunities that changed my life, so I want to help provide opportunities to others.

lender.name: Rohan
lender.loan_because: I like to make people smile.
lender.occupational_info: I have to clap, smile and give kisses and hugs on command. In addition, I have to constantly engage in interesting activities in order to keep my family amused. It's a rough life.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to be self employed and how much a little support can help.
lender.occupational_info: I design bookstore graphics and am a quilter. I'm also learning AutoCAD.

lender.name: Vivien
lender.loan_because: Caring & sharing is a better way to achieve world peace than killing & destroying. So glad I can help.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Because I think it is a great way to help people help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I am retired

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I believe in the example of Jesus. Hopefully, small acts of love are multiplied and change the world in a positive way.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital and help people with breathing problems or lung injuries.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I have borrowed money to accomplish my goals, and it gives me great pleasure to be able now to loan money so that others can accomplish their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from teaching and from other endeavours during my working years. I spend my time with my partner and my dogs in a wonderful house which we bought with bank loans. We love to travel, particularly to Mexico, South America and the South Pacific.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I disagree with my finance teacher; this is what I call interest.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to "pass it on" and help other succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a wide range of businesses anbd help them rapidly increase revenues.

lender.name: Stephan
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping those who help themselves.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I thought it is a nice Idea to help other people around the world take a step out of poverty. A week ago, me and my father Nigel Smith took Jameila a nineteen year old girl with a five month year old son out shopping for equipment and food in her new apartment, and I felt really lucky for what I have.

lender.name: Nancie
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with the abundance of good health, family and friends. I have been in situations where a little bit of help would have made all the difference in the world and so I would like to be part of that type of help to others. I am very excited about helping and hopefully making a difference. I plan to spread the word to those I come in contact with and to include a link to this site from my web site. Blessings to all!
lender.occupational_info: I an Independent Shaklee Products Distributor. We carry earth friendly products for both personal health and the health of your home. I am very proud of my association with Shaklee and all the company stands for. I have a website devoted to women of the Baby Boomer Age. Helping women with health and wellness, physical and financial body, mind and spirit, is my goal.

lender.name: Gyan
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people who help themselves. Hopefully making a (small) difference in improving one, two, three or a few lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Computer (IT) Services department of a bank.

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: I know the effectiveness of microenterprise development by prior work I've done in Indonesia and Ukraine. One person can make a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in community development building better neighborhoods. I help create jobs and housing. My trade is quality of life.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I am offering loans as a way of recognizing the EFFORT of my students; Annette K. earned this donation on behalf of the business she chose to support. ;-)
lender.occupational_info: I work with a WONDERFUL group of students . . .

lender.name: Vanda
lender.loan_because: Someone is always worse off then the next person
lender.occupational_info: I take care of mentally handicapped Men. It's a very rewarding job.

lender.name: Wendolyn
lender.loan_because: With the priviledge of wealth comes responsibility -- but duty is matched with delight as I connect with people around the world!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Pastor in the Lutheran Church (ELCA). The youth in our confirmation class are cheering on our entrepreneurs!

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to give back. My family and I have been helped in many ways, and I want to give back in some way too!
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home with my children, while my husband provides for our family financially. I love my work~ I am able to rear my children with love and provide for them a stable environment. I am so thankful I am able to do this.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs some help at some time and right now I can help.
lender.occupational_info: I develop computer programs for big oil companies.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I am committed to making the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I help buyers find the things the need and sellers find their customers.

lender.name: Sonny
lender.loan_because: I love to help others in needs of fund for businesses.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: Where there's life, there's hope. --Cicero
lender.occupational_info: I help to heal injured people.

lender.name: michelle
lender.loan_because: Its an easy opportunity to make a difference in someone's life. I also loan on behalf of friends and family and give them a portfolio of that loan for presents!
lender.occupational_info: My company connects consumers interested in sports with national brand advertisiers looking to reach that audience. We also sponsor and support sporting events.

lender.name: Anne-Grete
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people in third world countries to develop their own business so they can become economically independent and improve their lives. With just a little financial help from us, we can make a difference!!! Thanks Kiva.

lender.name: Mia
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I package and ship goods from our location to locations all over the world.

lender.name: Tineke
lender.loan_because: I want to give other people the chance to realise their dreams.

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: I heard about this on Oprah. I decided to provide loans to those in need as a "gift" to my work group (team). Instead of a starbucks or blockbuster gift card, they can enjoy this gift of "giving" to others, which is the true meaning of the season, right? --- it just felt like the right thing to do. Thanks for giving me the opportuity to chose this ongoing gift for my team.
lender.occupational_info: I work for AT&T, a large telecommunications company. I am a team lead for the Online group. We manage the att.com website.

lender.name: Shar
lender.loan_because: It is a good thing to help others...I know because many people have helped ME! As a global community, we're all connected and must be responsible for each other.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of "at risk" youth (students who are on drugs, etc.) in an urban public high school. In addition, I am an author, a lay minister with the United Church of Canada, and a lecturer at a university (educational psychology).

lender.name: Kevin Zernickow
lender.loan_because: Anybody who is willing to work to make their life better deserves the opportunity.

lender.name: Erika & Abbas
lender.loan_because: It is right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people to achieve their dreams.

lender.name: The Strub Family
lender.loan_because: Our family has been blessed in so many ways. Loaning together as a family allows us to help out those in less fortunate circumstances. It also teaches our younger children the importance of helping out others.
lender.occupational_info: Our family members work in a variety of different areas; medicine, computers, construction, sales, railroad, papermills...

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: my students and I want to help people who need money. We also like the idea of getting the money back so we can give it to someone else. We want to keep giving over and over again until no one is here anymore.
lender.occupational_info: We go to school in L.I.C., NY. We are elementary school students.

lender.name: Juana
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance and giving so little can help in such a big way.

lender.name: Mark & Rita
lender.occupation: Me- Plant ops / Wife - School system
lender.loan_because: We want to help people build a better life. Kiva provides the tool to bring the world community together to help others, this is incredible. Spread the Love Folks.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a Carbon dioxide recovery plant. My Wife is a Kitchen Worker at a local middle school .

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.

lender.name: Cristen
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people help themselves and I admire those who have the determination to be an entrepreneur. Plus, it is right to share our good fortune with others.
lender.occupational_info: I spend my days chasing after my 3 and 6 year old daughters!

lender.name: Saira
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are less fortunate and see them succeed. In addition, I want to instill in my young children the importance of giving and sharing.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the investment industry

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: IMF & World Bank are doing a poor job. The result of lending should be economically successful individuals not economic slaves.
lender.occupational_info: I am working to minimize my footprint on the world while still enjoying the gift of being alive.

lender.name: Lydia
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves an opportunity to succeed in life.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: We are all in this world together. If I can help someone by making his/her life easier - that's what it's all about.
lender.occupational_info: I work with high school students selecting classes, college planning and day to day situations that may interfere with the learning process.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: Last week we had our first big snow of the season and I took a "snow day!" I was watching Oprah and she mentioned Kiva. I was stunned by the stories and how a relatively small amount of money could make a real difference to someone. Had to check it out!
lender.occupational_info: We do commercial/industrial and residential water treatment.

lender.name: Jerry Ostradicky
lender.loan_because: there is nothing more fulfilling that helping people help themselves get out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I get up to date information on how my my contributions are helping people all over the world.

lender.name: Tamara Cobbin
lender.loan_because: Its very important to help others. There is a saying- "If you give a person a fish, you feed him for the day. If you teach a person how to fish, you feed him for a life time." I feel by loaning money I am helping people to achieve the goal of feeding themselves for a lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: I oversee the oporations of a medical centre that I designed and built for my husband who is a Family Doctor.

lender.name: Cecilia
lender.loan_because: I feel like helping people is something that is important and it is something that I would like to do in any way possible.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school student. I am fifteen years old and I go to school five days a week and work on the weekends. I'm very involved at school, and am a good student and involved in sports and theatre.

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: In honor of my mom, who is pictured, she passed away when she was just 30, and when I was just 5. She was a beautiful loving mom, can't wait till heaven, to hug her.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a kitchen have been since 1976, would love to own my own business one day, but this is a way to help others work there own business and stand proud doing so. I know working in a kitchen is hard work, however it is very rewarding, loving others with the food you make. Please know you are loved around the world. Good luck in all you do.

lender.name: morgan
lender.loan_because: i found out about it on the Oprah Show, i love to help people in anyway!!!

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: It's nice to think you can make a small difference to someone you don't even know.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: Some of these are single parents and that is difficult, I was one. Also I have wanted to volunteer in some of these countries now that I'm retired and have yet to get there, so if I can give a little to help someone, it makes my heart feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I now make jewelry (silver, copper, and bronze - metalsmithing) and I also paint on silk fabric for scarves and women's clothing. I am retired from working for the government.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: I want to help people get the opportunity to better their lives
lender.occupational_info: I am a student, but living in America I have many advantages others don't, and so want to help people around the world in specific ways.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: My brother introduced us to this by giving us a gift certificate. I love this idea because it seems like it can make a world of difference.
lender.occupational_info: I direct plays and musicals. Hopefully my work not only entertains people, but makes them think too.

lender.name: Joselita
lender.loan_because: We need to support each other.

lender.name: Diann
lender.loan_because: I think this makes a REAL difference in people'slives.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because:
kindness in words creates confidence
kindness in thinking creates profoundness
kindness in giving creates love
lender.occupational_info: editor. producer. --->creative weirdo@ a local tv station.

lender.name: Raley
lender.loan_because: I am able to. People here in the states loan to me, but others don't have that same chance and I can help provide that.
lender.occupational_info: I spend time with high school students and young people who are in need.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I am currently working through my church with HIV -positive patients in Kenya to start their own businesses. Kiva allows me another avenue to support small businesses world-wide, just as I received help when I started.
lender.occupational_info: I investigate the title of real estate prior to purchase to make sure it's clear of potential claims. I then facilitate the closing, record documents and disburse funds to the parties.

lender.name: Brett
lender.occupation: Riding Mountain National Park Gift Exchange

lender.name: Jamie Lynn
lender.loan_because:
My husband and I are grateful for the lives we lead; I want everyone to have an opportunity to feel this level of gratitude for themselves. As human beings, I believe we have an inherent need to share, help, and rely on one another in local & global communities.
However, having a BS in Environmental Science, I am unwilling to loan to those who use unsound environmental practices, such as the use of herbicides, pesticides, or extensive monocultures that lead to soil depletion and the need for purchasing fertilizers.
lender.occupational_info: I purchase and sell products for an independent, locally-owned health food market. We pride ourselves on selecting organic, sustainable, handmade, and locally-grown products to offer to our community.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I enjoy making change possible, on whatever scale
lender.occupational_info: FT peace professional through practice of Transcendental Meditation in groups

lender.name: sivu
lender.loan_because: Because i want to help people around the world to get ahead.

lender.name: wendy
lender.occupational_info: I am a customer service rep at a high tech company

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: This seems like a great way to lend a helping hand.

lender.name: Lysbeth
lender.loan_because: Jesus provides for me, so that I may bless others.

lender.name: Lorie
lender.loan_because: I love the concept that 100% of the money that I loan goes directly to the borrower and that for them, it could be life changing.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do! I love the fact that you can make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Auto Sales

lender.name: Gwen Knox
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying forward.
lender.occupational_info: Retiree

lender.name: Merijn
lender.loan_because: It's helping these people become selfsufficient.
lender.occupational_info: At the moment, I spend my time drawing educational material.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: In order to be successful, people need someone to believe in them and give them a chance. I want to let someone know that I believe in them.
lender.occupational_info: I work to help get safe and effective medicines to treat cancer approved by government agencies throughout the world.

lender.name: Cristalle
lender.occupation: Community Outreach and Government Affairs Manager
lender.loan_because: one person can make a difference if they try.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an association of people in real estate. We have over ten thousand members in our local area.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I believe that we are one world and one people. It is my hope that these loans will in some small way help to make this world a better place. Thanks to Kiva for giving me this opportunity to participate.
lender.occupational_info: I am an electronics technician and computer network technician. I am also an artist and musician and enjoy producing my own electronic music.

lender.name: Margy
lender.loan_because: I try to: "Live simply. Give more. Expect less."

lender.name: Andrea
lender.occupational_info: I help keep workers safe.

lender.name: Kristina
lender.loan_because: Tzedaka

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: I have all that I need, and more. Many others are not so fortunate. The people asking for loans work hard and deserve a chance to improve their lives and the lives of their families. Making a small loan to them is the least I can do.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: Giving money is a rewarding form of investment. I use KIVA to express my donor activism. I encourage others to be thoughtful in their giving and to be as generous as possible. Sharing and helping others to reach their dreams allows my footprint on Earth to last longer than my physical presence.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I believe that........ "to much is given, much is required."
lender.occupational_info: Believing in, working toward and imagining a world of educational access and equity!

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe that if we all helped eachother the world would be a better place!

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their goals and provide for their families.

lender.name: Carol Lee
lender.loan_because: My loan was actually a gift from my sister in law. This was a fabulous idea.
lender.occupational_info: For the past 3 decades, I have worked as a nurse and an educator of nursing students.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: It feels so good to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a volunteer child, family, and community advocate.

lender.name: Abe
lender.loan_because: I would like to help those who are trying to help themselves.

lender.name: Violet
lender.loan_because: I like helping someone realize their dreams and get out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Pay telephone bills for my company and handle all internal telephone needs in the office.

lender.name: Rachael
lender.loan_because: I want to help others. I want to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a middle school teacher. I love children and love to make a difference.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: "I've got to hear what you've got to say. 'cause when I hear you, I hear me. So speak up, and speak loud!"

lender.name: dave
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together
lender.occupational_info: i make music!

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: I can...

lender.name: Nguyen Family
lender.loan_because: My family and I are blessed to live in a country with a lot of opportunity. We would like to share our good fortune with others.
lender.occupational_info: Husband works as an information technology professional in the finance industry and wife is a school teacher that is currently a stay at home mother to two children.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I want to help others empower themselves and improve their lives.

lender.name: Nancy & Mike
lender.loan_because: it's satisfying to be able to help those in need.

lender.name: The Modde Family
lender.loan_because: We have, but do not need. They need, but do not have. Just seems logical to give.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to improve their quality of life for themselves, their families and community.
lender.occupational_info: I educate people about how to grow healthy plants.

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: Microfinancing makes a difference.

lender.name: Brownie Troop 45
lender.loan_because: The ability to give is life's most important lesson.

lender.name: Joe Hall
lender.loan_because: To help out other people to get ahead and to make a better life and become debt free
lender.occupational_info: I drive a truck over the road, some time's from the west coast to the east coast and from maine to florida have been in all 48 states. Have over 2 million safe mile's driven

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I've been there myself!
lender.occupational_info: I design exercise facilities for gyms, medical facilities and corporations.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who want to work to improve their lives. I am the first member of my family to graduate from college. My family came from Europe in 1930.
lender.occupational_info: I help children learn to improve their speech and language skills. I work in a public middle school.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: people in need
lender.occupational_info: I am 73 years old and am retired now

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I am what I am and have what I have due to others more than anything else and wish to help those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I heal and grow poison free food.

lender.name: Juliet
lender.loan_because: I am making a loan because I want to share what I've got
lender.occupational_info: I am a very active 66-year-old step-grandmother of 5, retired from the civil serivce with a reasonable pension

lender.name: Power Exchange
lender.occupational_info: We are 5 members of the Power family located in various parts of Ontario and New Brunsiwck.

lender.name: R. Gray
lender.loan_because: People the world over have the same basic needs . . . In America we sometimes forget that we have so much, so easily available, it is good to be reminded of that, and to help because we can. Even a group of kids can make a difference!

lender.name: Syd
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful opportunity to help others make a better life for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company who insures and suports credit unions all over the workld My primary role is working with Telephony and various computer systems.

lender.name: Ursula
lender.occupation: Domestic Diva/Owner of Eco Dog Pack

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: I can help others reaach their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Home-Based Certified Bookkeeping and Payroll Service. I have now been in business starting my Sixth year. I understand the struggles, this is my way of helping others reach their dreams.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I want to help others. God bless!

lender.name: Bob and Hannah
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my daughter about helping others that are in need. Hannah likes to see people in other parts of the world and how they support their family.

lender.name: emily
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves opportunities.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Multi-dimensional. I work full-time as an Administrative Specialist for a building materials company, part-time at home as an Asset Tracer and have recently begun www.bakersfieldsbugzoo.com, www.secretsistersociety.com, and www.janetsjeans.com.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Steve and Rhonda
lender.loan_because: we don't think hand-outs are always the answer and MicroLending is a great alternative that gives the added bonus of being able to connect with the individual.
lender.occupational_info: We teach in a small Christian school in the Bahamas. I teach computers, science and math and my wife teaches music, art, and language.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: just a little help from me can mean so much to someone else.

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: It is important to reach out and lend a hand. I find Kiva is a great way to do this.
lender.occupational_info: I support others to help them meet their goals.

lender.name: Carly
lender.loan_because: the amount may be small, but the impact is substantial. I believe it's not the money that makes the biggest difference to the recipients but rather the support they feel from around the world!
lender.occupational_info: I have the opportunity to work at one of the world's most diverse research labs -- and I'm not a scientist!

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I believe we each need to step forward and many forward steps put together will take us a long way to changing our world.
lender.occupational_info: I was an elementary school principal and teacher until retirement. I have and continue to train. future teachers at the University level. I am also helping to develop a training program for pastors for the Community of Christ.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. Be thankful for the things that you have, never give up on a dream, and always pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a pharmacy. I love that I have contact with many people. It is my job to see that they healthy and able to afford their medications.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: Adventurious...

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help someone else make a difference in their community.
lender.occupational_info: I create programming for a small business tv station in Bermuda.

lender.name: Reid
lender.loan_because: Sometimes we all need a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I build and repair houses

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: A tiny amount can make a huge difference
lender.occupational_info: I fundraise for the World Assoc of Girl Guides and Girl Scouts

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: why not?

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: I believe that every little bit helps.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: Economic parity is essential for social and political parity. Nobody is 'free' until they have economic independence.

lender.name: Jude
lender.loan_because: I have struggled to make ends meet during times in my life while raising my boys. I now want to help make someone else's journey through life a little less stressful.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Finance Manager for a non-profit agricultural organization.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I am able to help others now.
lender.occupational_info: I help patients with kidney failure with material and emotional problems related to this disease

lender.name: Yada
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work in a science lab trying to figure out how the brain and behavior are related.

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: Kiva allows persons of modest means, like me, to make a difference. Where else can one be a Blue Collar Philanthropist?
lender.occupational_info: I repair things in our local parks.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I dont make much money but maybe if we all share a little we can all be ok.
lender.occupational_info: I type documents into the computer in a small office.

lender.name: Neila Bennett
lender.loan_because: I love investing in projects that create and contribute positively to the world for gratitude and giving. It is my privilege and my pleasure. Thank you.
lender.occupational_info: In appreciation of the wonderous gifts I have been given, I create designs that add great value to peoples lives, keeping the flow of positive energy streaming through the world.

lender.name: Glenn and Lynne
lender.loan_because: I want to share what God has given me.
lender.occupational_info: I design printed documents. Magazines, advertisements.

lender.name: Mary and Beans
lender.loan_because: My 9 yr old daughter and I choose several ways to 'sponsor' local families every yr during the holidays, and for the past few yrs we've given goats, fresh water or wells, vet kits and now Kiva loans including cows, rice and housing. My daughter's answer to "Why?" is "Because we like to."
lender.occupational_info: I am a sign language interpreter for Deaf people, bridging communication gaps between people who can and can't hear.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I like people! We want to be able to give back to the world in a way that helps someone else acheive a good life! I am also working on starting my own golf clothing line. See the photo!
lender.occupational_info: Different all the time!

lender.name: Fritz
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a chance to live up to the occasion. Seeing the repayments restores my faith in humanity. I also believe more in micro loans than dishing out aid.
lender.occupational_info: Computer expert

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in a way that is effective, respectful of others' dignity, and demonstrates that not all Americans are clods when it comes to foreign relations.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a nonprofit organization in Greenville, South Carolina that celebrates cultural diversity, enables people to meet and learn from people from other countries, and helps international residents feel more welcome in American culture.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: my family wants to give something back to this amazing world

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to succeed.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help women around the world that just need that extra hand.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of the small business owner!
lender.occupational_info: My firm researches marketing and advertising campaigns for films and consumer packaged goods.

lender.name: Mary Ruhe/Wayne Snell
lender.loan_because: We can and we want to give someone hope and encouragement.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone.

lender.name: Hallie
lender.loan_because: I can respond to those in my own community who need help, but this is a fantastic way to connect with the needs of my global family. Thanks Kiva.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I feel very fortunate to live in Canada and I want to help others make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an intensive care unit helping take care of premature babies.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I wanted my money to be more useful than donating to charity and not getting to see the tangible results of one's generosity.
lender.occupational_info: Helping others help them selves to return to their day to day functional activities.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: I don't normally volunteer, but I like to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help create the foundations of large websites.

lender.name: Rolo
lender.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance

lender.name: Meghan
lender.loan_because: I want to be part of something bigger than me.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: hope is inexpensive, yet incredibly valuable.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I have seen the appreciation of those less fortunate with the simpliest things.

lender.name: Ballard High School
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I love to help people who want to help or better themselves. Visions turn into dreams and everyone should invision their dreams!
lender.occupational_info: I love to make one of a kind pieces of Art. Each different from the next, no two exactly alike, just like people, individuals, independent and unique.

lender.name: Pierre
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who have a dream.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working to make computers identify the sense of words in text

lender.name: stan
lender.loan_because: God blesses me, I pass it on!

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: To help out!
lender.occupational_info: newspaper publishing

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am realizing more and more how disconnected our world is. I want to be a part of connecting with people all over the world and giving is an easy way to do that.
lender.occupational_info: I recruit, organize, and train volunteers to work in public schools to help improve students' reading skills.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I love the KIVA premise, and the borrowers/entrepreneurs that it allows to develop and hopefully prosper. I feel priveliged to be a lender.
lender.occupational_info: I try to find the best people available and train them in my business, paying fairly but promising them that I will prepare them for a better future with my company or some other if they choose, if they work hard, are honest and reliable and willing to learn. I have always kept my word with my employees. Overall ,I am a business woman that believes in ethics, morality & hard work. I also believe in what I call the trinity of business; your employees, your customers and your vendors / suppliers. If you are fair and loyal to all three I believe that you will almost always succeed.

lender.name: Randi
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to have the money to help others, which makes me feel great!
lender.occupational_info: I help people to get government benefits that are meant to help poor people: cash, medical care and food. Sometimes it is very hard to get the benefits and a lawyer is needed. It is a great job and I love it.

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: I am a member of the world community, I unite with others in faith and love. I love to help facilitate unity and hope. I am open to giving and receiving.
lender.occupational_info: I am a healer of the body and soul. I help facilitate in helping people find their divine potential.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: We see the difference that such a loan can make in self esteem and self worth. We feel it important for all peoples to see the fruits of their ard work.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of students who are learning about economic struggles through out the world, and are glad to be apart of such a wonderful and obviously significant aid to those who just need a little extra help.

lender.name: Melissa & P
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Agnieszka
lender.loan_because: I am a believer in the entrepreneurial spirit...and that spirit needs money!

lender.name: Bobby
lender.loan_because: it is focused business help for people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I help translate the confusion of law to regular language.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I just want to help.
lender.occupational_info: Keeping the environment clean and taking care of my kids.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: Do not be daunted by the enormity of the worlds grief. Do justly now. Love mercy, now. Walk humbly, now. You are not obligated to complete the work, but neither are you free to abandon it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college soccer coach. I have had the chance to do freelance video production with several non profits organizations. I get to travel and film the work they are doing around the world. I then edit them into videos to help tell the stories of the work they are doing.

lender.name: Team Best
lender.loan_because: micro loans are the most efficient in changing lives of determined people.
lender.occupational_info: We are a French Immertion high school in Coquitlam Canada

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: It feels nice to actually be able to help, even if you can only give a little you can help a lot.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: We all have a responsibility to each other, to reach across our borders, beyond our horizons and to hold out a helping hand to a neighbor that we have yet to meet.
lender.occupational_info: Emotional Well-being Facilitator, I work with Australian Bush Flower Essences, the Emotional Freedom Technique (EFT) and channel energy (hands on healing) to relieve emotional and physical dis-ease.

lender.name: Kelli
lender.loan_because: I once got really lost when I was traveling in Kathmandu in Nepal. A young girl working at a market could see I was a little upset and offered to help. She got me a taxi and helped me find my way back to my hotel. Along the way she told me about her family and how they were working to save for her to go to school. When we got to where I needed to be, I offered her some money. She refused it outright and said that she was sure I would do the same for her if she was in the US. Her generosity was amazing and touching. Its time to give back!
lender.occupational_info: Lawyer that represents public schools and teachers.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I believe in Paying It Forward.
lender.occupational_info: I am a hospice volunteer manager. I recruit, train, educate, support and supervise volunteers who sit with the dying. Hospice volunteers are amazing and wonderful people. They give of themselves without expecting reward. They do difficult work, giving support to people who are dying. We should all take lessons from THEM. Also I am a Reiki Master Healer. I send the people asking for loans on this site Love and Light.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe people can achieve their goals if given the chance.
lender.occupational_info: I work in New York City, working with mortgages. I moved here 3 years ago from a rural area four hours away, and I love living in NYC.
